description: Spice up your breakfast with these delicious crispy tostadas with perfectly fried eggs, beans and hot sauce.
keywords: Tortilla,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Crispy Breakfast Tostadas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 limes, juice of 1, 1 sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan on high heat with a drizzle of oil and cook the kidney beans, chilli, cumin and lime juice for 34 minutes. Tip into a bowl, clean out the pan with kitchen paper and heat a drizzle of oil. Fry the eggs to your liking.
Heat the rest of the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the tortilas for 1 minute, flipping halfway through. Drain on kitchen paper.
Spread each tostada with kidney bean mix, top with an egg, slices of avocado, crumbled feta and a drizzle of hot sauce. Serve with lime wedges.
